scripts.build: ui5 build -a --clean-dest --include-task=generateManifestBundle generateCachebusterInfo && npm run zip
scripts.zip: mdk amend --target cloud && cd dist && npx bestzip ../MDKModule-content.zip *
scripts.buildmdk: cd ../.. && mdk build --target module --ui5 && cd Web/MDKModule && npm run sync2mdk
scripts.sync2mdk: rm -rf ../../.dist && npm install && npm run build && mkdir ../../.dist && mv MDKModule-content.zip ../../.dist/capex_doc2.zip
